short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: extension to copy page content to clipboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy text from any webpage with just one click for later use in ChatGPT, the simplest browser extension. Use it when you want to ask GPT questions about a specific webpage.
